dataCollection.title: Yig‚Äòiladigan Ma‚Äôlumotlar
dataCollection.content: Biz faqat siz to‚Äòg‚Äòridan-to‚Äòg‚Äòri taqdim etgan ma‚Äôlumotlarni yig‚Äòamiz; masalan, ismingiz, e-pochta manzilingiz, profil rasmi va tanlangan sozlamalar. Hech qanday sezgir yoki keraksiz ma‚Äôlumotlar yig‚Äòilmaydi.

dataUse.title: Ma‚Äôlumotlaringizdan Qanday Foydalanamiz
dataUse.content: Ma‚Äôlumotlaringiz faqat ilovani ishlatish, hisobingizni saqlash, funksiyalarni taqdim etish, tajribangizni shaxsiylashtirish va xizmatni yaxshilash uchun ishlatiladi. Biz ma‚Äôlumotlaringizdan reklama uchun foydalanmaymiz.

dataSharing.title: Ma‚Äôlumot Ulashish
dataSharing.content: Biz ma‚Äôlumotlaringizni sotmaymiz. Shaxsiy ma‚Äôlumotlaringizni faqat asosiy xizmatlarni amalga oshirish, qonun talablariga rioya qilish yoki platforma xavfsizligini ta‚Äôminlash uchun uchinchi tomonlar bilan ulashamiz.

security.title: Ma‚Äôlumot Xavfsizligi
security.content: Ma‚Äôlumotlaringizni ruxsatsiz kirish, oshkor qilish yoki noto‚Äòg‚Äòri foydalanishdan himoya qilish uchun standart xavfsizlik choralarini qo‚Äòllaymiz. Biroq, hech qanday uzatish yoki saqlash usuli to‚Äòliq xavfsiz emas.

subscriptions.title: Obunalar
subscriptions.content:
Noor Pray Tracker avtomatik yangilanadigan obunalarni taklif qiladi. Mavjud obuna variantlariga quyidagilar kiradi:

‚Ä¢ Oylik Obuna: Har oy yangilanadi.
‚Ä¢ Yillik Obuna: Har yili yangilanadi.

To‚Äòlov xarid tasdiqlanganda Apple ID hisobingizdan yechib olinadi. Obunalar joriy davr tugashidan kamida 24 soat oldin bekor qilinmasa, avtomatik ravishda yangilanadi. Apple ID hisobingiz joriy davr tugashidan 24 soat oldin yangilanish uchun to‚Äòlanadi.

Obunani qurilma sozlamalaridan istalgan vaqtda boshqarishingiz yoki bekor qilishingiz mumkin: Sozlamalar ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Obunalar.

Obuna narxlari xariddan oldin ilovada aniq ko‚Äòrsatiladi va mintaqaga qarab farq qilishi mumkin. Barcha xaridlar Apple tomonidan xavfsiz tarzda amalga oshiriladi. Bizda to‚Äòlov ma‚Äôlumotlariga kirish huquqi yo‚Äòq.

changes.title: Ushbu Siyosatdagi O‚Äòzgarishlar
changes.content: Zarur bo‚Äòlganda ushbu siyosatni yangilashimiz mumkin. Muhim o‚Äòzgarishlar bo‚Äòlsa, biz sizni ilova orqali yoki boshqa mos vositalar bilan xabardor qilamiz.

contact.title: Biz bilan Bog‚Äòlaning
contact.content: Agar maxfiylik yoki obunalar bo‚Äòyicha savollaringiz yoki so‚Äòrovlaringiz bo‚Äòlsa, ilovada taqdim etilgan qo‚Äòllab-quvvatlash kanali orqali istalgan vaqtda biz bilan bog‚Äòlanishingiz mumkin.

agreement.title: Shartlarga Rozilik
agreement.content: Ushbu ilovadan foydalanish orqali siz Xizmat Shartlariga rozilik bildirasiz. Agar rozi bo‚Äòlmasangiz, istalgan vaqtda ilovadan foydalanishni to‚Äòxtatishingiz mumkin.

usage.title: Qabul Qilingan Foydalanish
usage.content: Siz ilovadan faqat qonuniy va mo‚Äòljallangan maqsadlarda foydalanishga rozilik bildirasiz. Xizmatdan noto‚Äòg‚Äòri foydalanmasligingiz, uning ishlashiga xalaqit bermasligingiz yoki ruxsatsiz kirishga urinmasligingiz kerak.

subscriptions.title: Obunalar
subscriptions.content: Noor Pray Tracker avtomatik yangilanadigan obunalarni taklif qiladi. Mavjud variantlarga oylik va yillik obunalar kiradi. To‚Äòlov xarid tasdiqlangandan so‚Äòng Apple ID hisobingizdan yechib olinadi. Obunalar joriy davr tugashidan kamida 24 soat oldin bekor qilinmasa, avtomatik ravishda yangilanadi. Hisobingiz joriy davr tugashidan 24 soat oldin yangilanish uchun to‚Äòlanadi. Obunani istalgan vaqtda qurilma sozlamalaridan boshqarishingiz yoki bekor qilishingiz mumkin: Sozlamalar ‚Üí Apple ID ‚Üí Obunalar. Barcha xaridlar Apple tomonidan xavfsiz tarzda amalga oshiriladi va bizda to‚Äòlov ma'lumotlariga kirish yo‚Äòq. Narxlar mintaqaga qarab farq qilishi mumkin va xarid qilishdan oldin ilovada aniq ko‚Äòrsatiladi.

userContent.title: Foydalanuvchi Kontenti
userContent.content: Ilovada yuborilgan kontent uchun siz javobgarsiz. Kontentingiz hech qanday qonunlarni, huquqlarni yoki boshqalarning maxfiyligini buzmasligini tasdiqlaysiz.

termination.title: Hisobni Bekor Qilish
termination.content: Agar biz noto‚Äòg‚Äòri foydalanishni, ushbu shartlarning buzilishini yoki xizmat xavfsizligiga tahdid soluvchi faoliyatni aniqlasak, ilovaga kirishni to‚Äòxtatishimiz yoki bekor qilishimiz mumkin.

changes.title: Shartlardagi O‚Äòzgarishlar
changes.content: Biz ushbu Xizmat Shartlarini vaqti-vaqti bilan yangilashimiz mumkin. O‚Äòzgarishlardan keyin ilovadan foydalanishda davom etish ‚Äî yangilangan shartlarni qabul qilganingizni anglatadi.

contact.title: Biz bilan Bog‚Äòlanish
contact.content: Agar ushbu shartlar bo‚Äòyicha savollaringiz bo‚Äòlsa, ilovada taqdim etilgan qo‚Äòllab-quvvatlash kanali orqali biz bilan istalgan vaqtda bog‚Äòlanishingiz mumkin.

subscription.title: Noor Premium
subscription.subtitle: Namozdagi barqarorlik, jamoat va ruhiy o‚Äòsish uchun kuchli vositalar bilan imoningizni mustahkamlang.
subscription.terms: Avtomatik uzayadi, istalgan payt bekor qilishingiz mumkin. Obuna bo‚Äòlish orqali Shartlarga rozilik bildirasiz.

features.detailedStats: Go‚Äòzal grafiklar va seriyalar orqali namoz odatlaringizni chuqur tahlil qiling.
features.prayerReminders: Aqlli eslatmalar bilan namozni o‚Äòtkazib yubormang ‚Äî joylashuv va jadvalga moslashadi.

features.prioritySupport: Jamoamiz sizga tez va maxsus yordam ko‚Äòrsatadi.

sharedText.privacyNote: You can change these anytime in Settings.

intro_welcome.headline: Welcome
intro_welcome.body: Build a steady prayer routine with gentle reminders, qibla guidance, and simple learning‚Äîat your pace.

prayer_knowledge.headline: Do you know how to pray?
prayer_knowledge.body: Choose what fits you today. We‚Äôll tailor the experience.

yes_i_know.label: Yes, I know
yes_i_know.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll focus on consistency, reminders, and tracking‚Äîso your routine stays strong.

im_learning.label: I‚Äôm learning
im_learning.feedbackBody: Small steps add up. We‚Äôll guide you with clear, bite-sized lessons and practice support.

no_not_yet.label: Not yet
no_not_yet.feedbackBody: No worries. We‚Äôll help you learn from the basics with patience and clarity.

support_needed.headline: Do you need support to stay consistent with prayer?
support_needed.body: Choose your comfort level‚Äîthere‚Äôs no judgment.

yes_i_need_support.label: Yes, I want support
yes_i_need_support.feedbackTitle: You don‚Äôt have to do this alone
yes_i_need_support.feedbackBody: Support makes consistency easier. We can set up motivation that feels right for you.

some_support.label: Maybe a little
some_support.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep it light‚Äîgentle reminders and simple goals that won‚Äôt overwhelm you.

im_good.label: I‚Äôm good
im_good.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll stay out of your way and keep things clean and focused‚Äîonly what you need.

learn_islam.headline: Would you like to learn more about Islam?
learn_islam.body: Pick a direction‚Äîyour feed can be personalized.

quran_surahs.label: Qur‚Äôan & Surahs
quran_surahs.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll suggest short surahs, meaning highlights, and a gentle reading routine.

basics.label: Islam basics
basics.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll cover essentials in clear steps‚Äîbelief, worship, and daily practice.

im_good.label: I‚Äôm good for now
im_good.feedbackBody: You can explore learning later. We‚Äôll keep the focus on your prayer journey.

why_here.headline: Why are you here today?
why_here.body: Select all that apply. We‚Äôll personalize your setup.

pray_5_times.label: Pray 5 times daily
pray_5_times.feedback: We‚Äôll prioritize prayer times, streak-friendly goals, and practical reminders.

track_progress.label: Track my progress
track_progress.feedback: We‚Äôll set up simple tracking and reflections‚Äîfocused on improvement, not perfection.

learn_how_to_pray.label: Learn how to pray
learn_how_to_pray.feedback: We‚Äôll add step-by-step prayer guidance with short lessons and practice prompts.

just_checking.label: Just checking it out
just_checking.feedback: Take your time. We‚Äôll keep the experience light until you‚Äôre ready.

attribution.headline: Where did you hear about us?
attribution.body: This helps us improve and support more people.

friend_family.label: Friend or family
friend_family.feedbackBody: Word of mouth means a lot. May it be a benefit for everyone.

social_media.label: Social media
social_media.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep sharing helpful content‚Äîin a calm, respectful way.

app_store_search.label: App Store / Search
app_store_search.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll do our best to make your experience clear, simple, and useful.

masjid_community.label: Masjid / community
masjid_community.feedbackBody: Community support is powerful. May Allah strengthen our bonds.

online_article.label: Article / blog / website
online_article.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll keep the experience thoughtful and practical.

other.label: Other
other.feedbackBody: Thanks for sharing. You can tell us more anytime in Settings.

location_permission.headline: Where are you praying from?
location_permission.body: Allow location to show accurate prayer times and qibla direction for your area.

onAllow.feedbackBody: We‚Äôll use this only to help with qibla and prayer times.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can set your city manually anytime.

notification_permission.headline: Never miss prayer times
notification_permission.body: Turn on notifications for prayer reminders, gentle nudges, and important updates you choose.

onAllow.feedbackBody: Reminders are on. You can customize the tone and schedule anytime.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can enable reminders later in Settings whenever you‚Äôre ready.

all_set.headline: You‚Äôre all set
all_set.body: We‚Äôre with you‚Äîone prayer at a time. May your journey be steady and full of barakah.

socialProof.note: Social proof text should be used only if you can verify this rating in your product.

splash.headline: {{APP_NAME}}
splash.subheadline: A calm space to support your salah, step by step.

friends_motivation_modal.headline: Motivation with friends
friends_motivation_modal.body: Invite friends to encourage each other, share gentle check-ins, and celebrate progress‚Äîwithout pressure.
